text: Awo kabona anaddiranga ku musaayi, n’agusiiga ku mayembe ag’oku kyoto okwoterezebwa obubaane obw’akawoowo, ekiri mu Weema ey’Okukuŋŋaanirangamu mu maaso ga Mukama. Omusaayi gwa sseddume ogunaasigalangawo gwonna, anaaguyiwanga ku ntobo y’ekyoto eky’ebiweebwayo ebyokebwa ekiri ku mulyango gwa Weema ey’Okukuŋŋaanirangamu.
